phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog is at the starting point (25.0, 25.0), awaiting coordinates from the drone. The drone is scanning the field to identify the 10x10 meter area containing the ball.
phases.phase_target: Receive the coordinates of the 10x10 meter area from the drone.

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog has received the coordinates of the 10x10 meter area (area_X, area_Y) from the drone. It is ready to navigate to this area to begin scanning for the ball.
phases.phase_target: Given the area coordinates (area_X, area_Y), move to the center of the 10x10 meter area.

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog is at the center of the 10x10 meter area (center_X, center_Y), ready to scan for the ball. It can scan up to 2 meters in all directions.
phases.phase_target: Scan the area to locate the ball within the 10x10 meter area.

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog has identified the ball's exact location (ball_X, ball_Y) within the 10x10 meter area. It is prepared to move to the ball's location.
phases.phase_target: Move to the ball's location and retrieve it.

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog has retrieved the ball and is ready to return to the starting point (25.0, 25.0).
phases.phase_target: Return to the starting point with the ball.
